br.uff.midiacom.ana.node
Class NCLBindRule<B extends NCLBindRule,N extends NCLNode,R extends NCLTestRule>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.node.NCLBindRule<B,N,R>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, java.lang.Comparable<B>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLBindRule<B extends NCLBindRule,N extends NCLNode,R extends NCLTestRule>
extends NCLElement
implements java.lang.Comparable<B>

Esta classe define o elemento bindRule de um switch da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define um bind de um switch de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
